item.title: Arch Linux Installation guide

item.title: Avoiding Sunk Cost Fallacy
item.description: Whatâ€™s sunk cost anyway? Â§ Sunk cost is the cost the has been put in motioned which cannot be recovered. For example, in practice this can mean money thatâ€™s has been used to purchase machinery in a manufacturing line or past effort and time that has been put towards a goal.
